mapper.select: select w.*, b.name b_name, t.name t_name, q.name q_name, t.team_leader t_leader, t.leader_school t_school, t.advisor t_advisor, b.work_expert b_work_expert, a.*, from (((work w inner join team t on w.team_id = t.id) inner join question q on w.ques_id = q.id) inner join batch b on q.batch_id = b.id) inner join allocation a on a.team_id = t.id
mapper.insert: insert into city.work(name, user_id, team_id, ques_id, rule_id) values (#{name}, #{user_id}, #{team_id}, #{ques_id},#{rule_id})
mapper.update: update city.work set name = #{name}, user_id = #{user_id}, team_id = #{team_id}, ques_id = #{ques_id}, rule_id = #{rule_id}, where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from city.work
and `question` like concat('%',#{question},'%')
